questions.quote: Wait a minute. Wait a minute. As long as you're going to lie to the guy, why don't you tell him that you lost both of the tickets, then we can go?
How does sitting next to a person in a movie theater increase the level of enjoyment? You can't talk during a movie. You know, this is stupid, c'mon, let's just go.
Sally, you can't quit the business. This is all because of me.
Well, that didn't work. Hey, how about this…ketchup and mustard in the same bottle?
O'Henry?  That's one of our top-selling candy bars.  It's got chocolate, peanuts, nougat, it's delicious, scrumptious, outstanding!  Have you been to a doctor?
Oh, you got the Civil War book.  I saw some of that show, it was wonderful.
No, but I saw the look on his face when he put his arm around me. And then we went to his apartment, and I sat on one of his chairs and it broke. And he says, "Boy, you're a lot of woman!"
It does itch. Maybe I will go down at Kruger and talk to her.
Hey how about that ball man injuring Monica Seles. Wasn't that something.
All right. That's enough for today. You're tired. Get some sleep. I'll see you first thing in the morning.
